Versions.summary:
- Updated to Linux 3.0.57
- Wolfson Sound Control
- Fixed exynos exploit (AndreiLux)
- Fixed sammy power saving mode (AndreiLux)
- Revised init.d (now accept every script name)
- Allow max brightness of 255 (nebkat)
- Fixed HDMI audio streaming
- Many more fixes and improvements (see xda)
